events.name: Amp'd Up!
events.description: Come challenge the brothers of Nu Delta to ping pong, foosball, Smash and many more games (unfortunately Jamaican bobsledding, trapeze jousting, and drag races to the moon not included) to compete for a very, very special prize. ;) Hint hint wink wink nudge nudge: the very special prize is a new HD flatscreen TV.

events.name: A Taste of Nu Delta
events.description: Ever craved fresh biscochos, delicious Roti, or savory indomie? Nu Delta is a very diverse community from all over the country as well as the world. Come enjoy bountiful aromas and succulent flavors of the cuisine of many of our cultures as we show off our beautiful house in Back Bay.

events.name: Jet Skis
events.description: As a wise man once said, 'they don’t want you to jet ski.' Join us on the journey to success as we shred the waters at Plymouth Water Sports.

events.name: Paintball
events.description: Don your gear and get ready to go to war with the brothers of Nu Delta as we hit up Boston PaintBall for some colorful action.

events.name: Monster Jam
events.description: This is going to be the hottest party on the block with the best tracks, from the newest hits to the most classic throwbacks. Unleash your inner monster and dance the night away with the brothers of Nu Delta.

events.name: Shooting Range
events.location: Meet at 460 Beacon Street → Manchester, NH
events.description: Let’s get some target practice in before the year begins! Whether it’s your first time or you’re a seasoned veteran, come start the new year with a bang.

events.name: Skyzone
events.location: Meet at 460 Beacon Street → Skyzone Boston
events.description: Enjoy a great afternoon at SkyZone with us doing flips and playing dodgeball with the acrobatic brothers of ND.

events.name: Laser Tag
events.description: Ever wanted to blast away your friends with futuristic weaponry? Well, that’s illegal but you can do it legally with us! Join us for very fast-paced games of laser tag at LazerQuest Boston.

events.name: Target Runs
events.location: Meet at 460 Beacon Street → Somerville, MA
events.description: Need any last minute school supplies? We’ll take a few trips to Target so you can be ready for the school year.

events.name: Rockbed BBQ
events.description: You like stooping on the stoop? Come by for the best burgers, hot dogs, and veggie burgers on our Phoenix Rockbed on our front steps.

events.name: Dick's Last Resort (Invite Only)
events.location: Meet at 460 Beacon Street → Dick's Last Resort
events.description: Enjoy tasty food and terrible waiters with us at Dick’s Last Resort in Quincy Market.
